title: Marco Pierre White Jr gets community order after threatening maid
text:
Marco Pierre White Jnr, 24, admitted threatening an assistant at his celebrity chef father's hotel on March 10, at Swindon's Magistrates Court

Troubled reality TV star Marco Pierre White Jr has been ordered to complete 250 hours of unpaid work after threatening a maid at his celebrity father's hotel.

The heavily-tattooed Celebrity Big Brother contestant was slapped with the two-year community order after admitting to the incident last month.

Swindon Magistrates Court was previously told that Pierre White Jr, 24, had verbally abused the worker at the Rudloe Hall Hotel near Bath after she caught him in a room that wasn’t his.

Hospitality assistant Chloe Charlesworth noticed the door to room 223 was on latch during her shift and went into the room to discover the bed was unmade and clothes strewn across the floor on March 10, the court heard.

She reported it to her line manager and reception, who told her the room was supposed to be unoccupied - and on return found Pierre White Jr coming out of the bathroom.

He said he did not want people to know he was there and verbally abused her before beginning to approach.

The tattooed star left Miss Charlesworth scared and her body 'shaking', according to the prosecutor Nick Barr.

Pierre White Jr 'put her in fear of immediate violence' and then fled the scene.

She still works at the hotel and the court was told there has been no issues between them since.

Mr Barr added: 'Everybody wants to put a line under what has happened.'

Pierre White Jr also admitted possession of heroin at a branch of Costa Coffee, possession of 204 Oxycodone tablets, failing to pay a £30 taxi fare and failing to pay a £34.60 food bill.

Staff member Chloe Charlesworth noticed a room door was on latch at the Rudloe Hall Hotel in Corsham, Wiltshire, (pictured) and found clothes strewn across the floor - and after finding out that the room was meant to stay unoccupied, she returned to find the reality emerging from the bathroom

The son of chef Marco Pierre White, Pierre White Jr was also ordered to complete up to 20 rehabilitation activity days at the same court today.

The sessions will enable him to do probation service courses.

Pierre White Jr has a troubled history with drugs.

He was said to have been addicted to heroin and spending between £50 and £60 on his habit when he was caught with the Class A substance in the coffee shop.
description: Marco Pierre White Jr was slapped with the two-year community order after admitting to threatening a maid at his celebrity chef father's luxury Rudloe Hall Hotel near Bath.
